mapper.select: select * from community where gid in (select gid from user_community where uid=#{uid})
select * from users where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update users set user_img=#{user_img} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into user_likecomments values (#{uid},#{pid},#{comment_id}) update item_comments set likeTimes=likeTimes+1 where comment_id=#{comment_id}
mapper.delete: delete from user_likecomments where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid} and comment_id=#{comment_id} update item_comments set likeTimes=likeTimes-1 where comment_id=#{comment_id}
mapper.select: select * from item_details where uid=#{uid} order by create_time desc;
select * from user_community where uid=#{uid} and gid=#{gid}
mapper.delete: delete from user_community where uid=#{uid} and gid=#{gid}
mapper.select: select * from user_likedetails where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}
mapper.delete: delete from user_likedetails where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid} update item_details set like_times=like_times-1 where pid=#{pid}
mapper.insert: insert into user_likedetails values(#{uid},#{pid},#{like_time}) update item_details set like_times=like_times+1 where pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: select * from community as c,userlookcommunity_time as ut where ut.uid=#{uid} and ut.gid=c.gid order by last_sign_time desc OFFSET 0 ROW FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
select * from userlookcommunity_time where uid=#{uid} and gid=#{gid}
mapper.insert: insert into userlookcommunity_time values (#{uid},#{gid},#{last_sign_time}) update community set total_times=total_times+1, day_times=day_times+1, week_times=week_times+1, month_times=month_times+1, threemonth_times=threemonth_times+1, sixmonth_times=sixmonth_times+1, year_times=year_times+1 where gid=#{gid}
mapper.update: update userlookcommunity_time set last_sign_time=#{last_sign_time} where uid=#{uid} and gid=#{gid} update community set total_times=total_times+1, day_times=day_times+1, week_times=week_times+1, month_times=month_times+1, threemonth_times=threemonth_times+1, sixmonth_times=sixmonth_times+1, year_times=year_times+1 where gid=#{gid}
